snippet.title: F-Zero GX trailer from E3 2002 with no audio-video desync
snippet.description:
When this trailer was shown during the E3 2002 event, it had notable audio-video desync. It isn't a problem with how it was recorded: it was actually like that when it was shown. In fact, all recordings of it have this problem.

Hopefully we will obtain this trailer in lossless quality one day...
